projects.title: E-Commerce Platform

projects.description: A comprehensive healthcare application providing patient management, appointment scheduling, and telemedicine capabilities.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: An intuitive data visualization platform with real-time analytics, custom reporting, and interactive charts for business intelligence.

projects.title: CRM System
projects.description: A complete customer relationship management system with lead tracking, sales pipeline management, and automated workflows.

projects.title: Online Marketplace
projects.description: Multi-vendor e-commerce marketplace with advanced search, seller dashboard, commission tracking, and secure payment processing.

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.description: Complete food delivery solution with real-time tracking, payment integration, and restaurant management system.

projects.title: Digital Banking Platform
projects.description: Secure online banking platform with account management, transaction history, loan processing, and fraud detection.

projects.title: Fashion E-Store
projects.description: Modern fashion retail platform with AR try-on features, wishlist, size recommendations, and social shopping.

projects.title: Project Management Suite
projects.description: Comprehensive project management platform with task tracking, team collaboration, time logging, and reporting.
